animation.description: The animation. If false the animation effect is disabled.
animation.description_zh: 动画。如果为 false，则禁用动画效果。

children.description: Optional children to infer width and height from.
children.description_zh: 从中推断宽度和高度的可选子项。

classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.See CSS classes API below for more details.
classes.description_zh: 覆盖或扩展应用于组件的样式。有关详细信息，请参阅下面的 CSS 类 API。

component.description: The component used for the root node. Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
component.description_zh: 用于根节点的组件。使用 HTML 元素或组件的字符串。

height.description: Height of the skeleton. Useful when you don't want to adapt the skeleton to a text element but for instance a card.
height.description_zh: 骨架的高度。当您不想将骨架调整为文本元素（例如卡片）时很有用。

sx.description: The system prop that allows defining system overrides as well as additional CSS styles.See the `sx` page for more details.
sx.description_zh: 允许定义系统覆盖以及其他 CSS 样式的系统属性。有关更多详细信息，请参阅“sx”页面。

variant.description: The type of content that will be rendered.

width.description: Width of the skeleton. Useful when the skeleton is inside an inline element with no width of its own.
width.description_zh: 骨架的宽度。当骨架位于没有自身宽度的内联元素内时很有用。
